org.openimaj.data.dataset

Interface Dataset<INSTANCE>

  • Type Parameters:
    INSTANCE - the type of items in the dataset
    All Superinterfaces:
    Iterable<INSTANCE>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    GroupedDataset<KEY,DATASET,INSTANCE>, ListDataset<INSTANCE>, ShapeModelDataset<IMAGE>, StreamingDataset<INSTANCE>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractIRCStreamDataset, AbstractTwitterSearchDataset, AbstractTwitterStatusesFilterDataset, AbstractTwitterStreamDataset, ATandTDataset, BasicIRCStreamDataset, BingImageDataset, ClusterEvalDataset, ContextRoundRobinTwitterSearchAPIDataset, Corel5kDataset, FDDBDataset, FlickrImageDataset, ListBackedDataset, MapBackedDataset, MusicSpeechDataset, ReadableGroupDataset, ReadableListDataset, RoundRobinTwitterSearchAPIDataset, TextFileDataset, TwitterSearchDataset, TwitterStreamDataset, TwitterStreamFilterDataset, UKBenchGroupDataset, UKBenchListDataset, VFSGroupDataset, VFSListDataset, WikipediaEditsDataset, WineDataset

    public interface Dataset<INSTANCE>
extends Iterable<INSTANCE>
    The super-interface for all types of dataset. Each data instance may have attributes. All datasets provide a way to iterate through their instances via the Iterable interface.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
